definition: short-tailed bird
short-tailed bird

sentences.english: I am favored with excellent sight.
sentences.chinese: 我生來就有極隹的視力。

sentences.english: White wine provided the perfect accompaniment to the meal.
sentences.chinese: 白葡萄酒是這頓飯的最隹佐餐酒。

sentences.english: A:Will you send the letter to the chairman of the committee?
sentences.chinese: 您這封隹交給委員會主席好嗎？

sentences.english: He is, beyond question, the best man for the job.
sentences.chinese: 他們報告說，他是這項工作最隹的人選。

sentences.english: She won an Oscar nomination for best supporting actress.
sentences.chinese: 她獲得奧斯卡獎最隹女配角的提名。

sentences.english: He imputed his failure to ill health.
sentences.chinese: 他把失敗歸咎於健康不隹。

sentences.english: Will you send the letter to the chairman of the committee?
sentences.chinese: 您這封隹交給委員會主席好嗎？

sentences.english: He is a natural for the job .
sentences.chinese: 他是該工作最隹的人選。

sentences.english: Shaoxing rice wine is great in color, smell and taste.
sentences.chinese: 紹興黃酒，芬芳醇厚，色香味俱隹。

sentences.english: I am used to hard word.
The reason it becomes a kind of quality wine lies much in the water it uses.
sentences.chinese: 紹興黃酒所以成爲隹釀，與所用的水關係很大。

definition: old variant of 某[mou3]
old variant of 私[si1]
"lid" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 8)
to walk (side part of split character)
"cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14), occurring in 軍|军[jun1], 冠[guan1] etc, known as 禿寶蓋|秃宝盖[tu1 bao3 gai4] or 平寶蓋|平宝盖[ping2 bao3 gai4]
receptacle
hands joined
stripes of a tiger/"tiger" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 141)
"roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]
variant of 假[jia3]/to borrow
hog/swine
"knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
"speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 13), occurring in 用, 同, 网 etc/see also 同字框[tong2 zi4 kuang4]
step with the left foot (Kangxi radical 60)/see also 彳亍[chi4 chu4]
"walk slowly" component in Chinese characters/see also 冬字頭|冬字头[dong1 zi4 tou2]
archaic variant of 節|节[jie2]
one of the characters used in kwukyel, an ancient Korean writing system
